title: Template Engine Simulator
description: Build a mini template engine that supports variable interpolation, conditionals, loops, and inheritance to understand how Django templates work.
instructions: Create a TemplateEngine class that parses and renders templates with Django-like syntax.

hints.text: **Hint:** Use `re.sub()` with a callback function to process each pattern. For loops, create a new context that includes the loop variable. Process for loops before if statements, and both before variable interpolation.

commonMistakes.mistake: Not processing nested templates in correct order
commonMistakes.consequence: Variables inside loops don't get rendered
commonMistakes.correction: Process for loops first, then if statements, then variables - or call variable rendering recursively inside loops
